# Get Details of a Merchant Token Event

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get the details of a merchant token event after receiving a notification.

## Discussion

For information about setting your server’s notification URL to receive life-cycle events, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PassKit/PKAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest/tokenNotificationURL] in [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PassKit/PKAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PassKit/PKRecurringPaymentRequest/tokenNotificationURL] in [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PassKit/PKRecurringPaymentRequest], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/apple_pay_on_the_web/applepayautomaticreloadpaymentrequest/3955921-tokennotificationurl] in [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest], or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/apple_pay_on_the_web/applepayrecurringpaymentrequest/3955958-tokennotificationurl] in [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayRecurringPaymentRequest].

## Merchant token event retrieval

- **MerchantTokenEventResponse**: A response body that contains information about a life-cycle event for a merchant token.
- **MerchantTokenMetadata**: The card information related to a merchant token, including its card art and metadata.
- **CardArt**: Data for displaying art to represent a card.
- **CardMetadata**: Data about the card, including its expiration date and suffix.
